name: Mandala #2 - Neon
description: "From the body of the unborn essence arises the sphere of light, and from that sphere of light arises wisdom. From the wisdom arises the seed syllable and from the seed syllable arises the complete Mandala, the deity and the retinue.” – Tenzin Wangyal Rinpoche | Format: PNG at 8001 x 8001 pixels. | Handmade with Illustrator.
